txt.en: The ground here looks to have little ore
The ground here looks to have some ore
The ground here looks to be rich with ore
The iron being mined at Ghâmpronk can be used to make needed weapons and armour.

'Every day, new warriors take up the fight to defend our lands. In order to fight, they each need their own weapons and armour; otherwise, the battle is short and unsatisfying in its results.\n\n'The goblins have primed a mine for us across the river, at Ghâmpronk. Bring this pick, head to the mine, and gather what iron you can scavenge.'
Iron can be mined at Ghâmpronk.\n\nWaldeg asked you to venture across the river to Ghâmpronk and mine iron.
'This iron will allow us to outfit many new warriors.'
Waldeg is at Snowbourn.\n\nWaldeg will be pleased to begin making weapons and armour with the iron from Ghâmpronk.
'Let me know when you are ready to get your hands dirty at Ghâmpronk.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>
Use your pick-axe to dig for Iron at Ghâmpronk ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Aiding the Eastemnet will cancel this quest</rgb>
Completing Aiding the Eastemnet will cancel this quest
